app.activity_view_wip: Mwonekano wa Shughuli unakuja hivi karibuni
app.login_details_desc: Tafadhali ingiza maelezo yako ya kuingia ili upate ufikiaji wa usanidi. Au wasiliana na msimamizi.
app.no_worries: Hakuna wasiwasi! Peana barua pepe yako na uangalie kisanduku pokezi chako kwa kiungo cha kuweka upya.
app.no_posts_found:
Samahani, hakuna machapisho yaliyopatikana
kulingana na vigezo vya utafutaji wako.
app.location_instruction: Unaweza kutafuta au kubonyeza eneo la ramani ambapo ungependa kuweka alama.
app.internal_task_instruction: Jukumu hili limetiwa alama kwa matumizi ya ndani pekee. Haionekani na watumiaji wakati wanaunda chapisho.
app.related_post_hint: Tafadhali kumbuka, machapisho yanayohusiana na haja ya kuchapishwa, machapisho ambayo "Yanakaguliwa" hayataonekana katika matokeo ya utafutaji.
app.privacy_policy_text:
Ushahidi imejitolea kulinda faragha yako.

Ni haki yako kufahamishwa kuhusu jinsi Ushahidi hudhibiti taarifa zako za kibinafsi. Tunatoa Sera hii ya Faragha ili kueleza jinsi tunavyokusanya, kupokea, kutumia, kuhifadhi, kushiriki na kufichua data yako kupitia Huduma zetu.

Ili kurahisisha kusoma kwa sera hii, Tovuti, huduma, mifumo na Programu zetu kwa pamoja huitwa "Huduma." Ikiwa una maswali yoyote kuhusu data yako ya kibinafsi na sera zetu, tafadhali tuma barua pepe kwaprivacy@ushahidi.com

Sera hii ya Faragha haitumiki kwa Huduma zozote za Watu Wengine (kama ilivyofafanuliwa hapa chini), hata kama zinaweza kufikiwa kupitia Huduma zetu.

Pia, tafadhali kumbuka kuwa isipokuwa tufafanue neno katika Sera hii ya Faragha, maneno yote yenye herufi kubwa yanayotumiwa katika Sera ya Faragha yana maana sawa na katika Sheria na Masharti yetu. Kwa hivyo, tafadhali hakikisha kwamba umesoma na kuelewa Sheria na Masharti yetu.

Imejumuishwa katika Sera Yetu

Sisi ni Nani

  • Ukusanyaji na Matumizi ya Taarifa
  • Njia Tunazotumia Taarifa Zako
  • Taarifa tunazosambaza na Wahusika wa Tatu
  • Sheria za Ulinzi wa Data
  • Haki zako
  • Chaguo lako
  • Kujibu Ishara za "Do Not Track"
  • Usalama wa Taarifa Yako
  • Muda ambao tunahifadhi data yako
app.404: Lo... Samahani, hatuwezi kupata ukurasa unaotafuta. Tafadhali tafuta kwa kifungu kingine cha maneno au rudi kwenye Mwonekano wa Ramani.
app.choose_deployment: Chagua Utendakazi mmoja kutoka kwenye orodha
app.locate_deployment: Tafuta utendakazi: Tafuta kwa neno kuu ama uweke URL
app.toc_text:
These Terms of Service (the “Terms”) and our Privacy Policy apply to and govern your use of any websites owned or operated by Ushahidi Inc. (“Ushahidi”) that post a link to these Terms (such websites, the “Sites”), the Ushahidi services accessible via the Sites (including any cloud-based servers or platforms) and the Ushahidi mobile device applications (the “Apps”).

To make these Terms easier to read, the Sites, our services, platforms, and Apps are collectively called the “Services.” Please note that these Terms do not cover any of our products you download under an open source license. Additionally, these Terms may not apply if you have entered into a separate agreement with Ushahidi that governs your relationship with us, such as a separately-negotiated enterprise agreement.

Agreement To Terms

these Terms, do not use the Services. If you are accessing and using the Services on behalf of a company (such as your employer) or other legal entity, you represent and warrant that you have the authority to bind that company or other legal entity to these Terms.

In that case, “you” and “your” will refer to that company or other legal entity.

info.auth_not_online: Pole. Hauko mtandaoni...tafadhali angalia muunganisho wako wa mtandao
info.post_submitted_online: Asante kwa kuwasilisha ripoti yako. Chapisho linakaguliwa na timu yetu na hivi karibuni litaonekana kwenye jukwaa.
info.post_submitted_offline: Thank you for your report. A message will be sent when the connection is restored.
